reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://install.qa3.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Pub Ads' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Ads' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Ads' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Publisher Ads Side Files' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Publisher Ads Side Files dialog'.
Click the 'Add' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add a new side file dialog'.
Enter '9ed8ae32fe2246d' in the 'Name' text box.
Enter '208c0dc717/19e0c51626.html' in the 'Path' text box.
Select the 'text/html' from the 'Response type' drop down list.

Enter '<html><body bgcolor=white><script language=javascript>function pq(q) {if(q.length > 1) this.q = q.substring(1, q.length);else this.q = null;this.keyValuePairs = new Array();if(q) {for(var i=0; i < this.q.split("&").length; i++) {this.keyValuePairs[i] = this.q.split("&")[i];}}this.getValue = function(s) {for(var j=0; j < this.keyValuePairs.length; j++) {if(this.keyValuePairs[j].split("=")[0] == s)return this.keyValuePairs[j].split("=")[1];}return -1;}}function qs(key){var page = new pq(document.location.search);return unescape(page.getValue(key));}var _c = qs('c');var r_number = Math.random();document.writeln('<SCR'+'IPT language='JavaScript' S'+'RC="http://media.adcentriconline.com/adcentric/tag/'+_c+'?ADCadcifr=1&number='+r_number+'"></SCR'+'IPT>');</script></body></html>' in the 'Content' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Publisher Ads Side Files dialog'.
Verify success message of '9ed8ae32fe2246d has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the Ad Side File link with path '208c0dc717/19e0c51626.html'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Publisher Ads Side Files dialog'.
Click the Ad Side File 'Edit' link for adName + 'AdCentric'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit side file adcentric dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Publisher Ads Side Files dialog'.
Verify success message of 'adcentric has been updated' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify storage type for Ad Side File 'AdCentric' is set to 'Overridden'.
Click the Ad Side File 'Edit' link for adName + 'AdCentric'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit side file adcentric dialog'.
Click the 'Revert' button.
Click the 'Revert' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Publisher Ads Side Files dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The item has been reverted.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify storage type for Ad Side File 'AdCentric' is set to 'Default'.
Click the Ad Side File expand link for adName + 'AdCentric'.
Click the Ad Side File 'Clone' link for adName + 'AdCentric'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Clone side file adcentric dialog'.
Enter '9af7804ed6214ea' in the 'Name' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'clone_of_adcentric has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
